title: Underline
$comment:
Analogues of `Underline` in other schema include:
- JATS XML [`<underline>`](https://jats.nlm.nih.gov/archiving/tag-library/1.1/element/underline.html)
- Pandoc [`Underline`](https://github.com/jgm/pandoc-types/blob/master/src/Text/Pandoc/Definition.hs)

type.$comment:
This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.
It is extended with the titles of all descendant types during
the generation of schema.json files.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.
